author: makortel
body:
Backport of #13729. Original description:

> This PR fixes a bug introduced in #11624, where in an `if` statement a pixel barrel was required, but it should have been pixel endcap.

Branch is based on 7_6_0, and it was tested in 8_0_1. In the PR tests there are probably no changes visible because the affected code path does not get run.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Fix RectangularEtaPhiTrackingRegion (80X)
